data.title: Four types of digital media and their benefits [Infographic]
data.meta_description: Digital media has become a huge part of our everyday lives. This is because it holds different benefits compared to traditional media. Not sure what exactly digital media is all about? No worries, media update`s Talisa Carlson takes a closer look here.
data.text:
Your browser does not support the canvas.

Digital media has become a huge part of our everyday lives. This is because it holds different benefits compared to traditional media. Not sure what exactly digital media is all about? No worries, media update’s Talisa Carlson takes a closer look here.

Before we jump into the different types of digital media it is important to understand what exactly it is. According to Lauryn Preston from Digital Logic: "Digital media is any form of media that uses electronic devices for distribution. This form of media can be created, viewed, modified, and distributed via electronic devices."

This also means that digital media can be shared a lot wider and a lot more frequently than traditional media. But, what are the different forms of this type of media?

Let’s take a look:

Which digital media is your favourite? Let us know in the comments section below.

Loving this type of content? Then why not subscribe to our newsletter?

Want to look back this year and see which trends made headlines in the media space? Then be sure to read A wrap up of 2021’s media trends.
